exception.message:
Expected a valid w3c document but got:
ERROR; line 34: Element “p” not allowed as child of element “h3” in this context. (Suppressing further errors from this subtree.)
ERROR; line 35: Heading cannot be a child of another heading.
ERROR; line 43: Named character reference was not terminated by a semicolon. (Or “&” should have been escaped as “&”.)
